title: Roasted Acorn Squash with Mushroom Ragu
directions: Brush the interior of each squash half with ½ tsp. oil.
Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, or until tender when pierced with a fork. Remove from oven. Set aside.
Heat remaining 2 tsp. oil in large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add onion and mushrooms; cook, stirring frequently, for 6 to 7 minutes, or until onions are translucent and mushrooms are lightly browned.
Add tomatoes and oregano. Season with salt and pepper if desired; cook, stirring frequently, for 10 minutes.
Spoon half of the sauce mixture into each squash half.
ingredients: 1 acorn squash, cut in half, seeds removed
1 tsp. fresh oregano (or thyme), finely chopped
Sea salt and ground black pepper (to taste; optional)
